Text: If you own a Kindle You can email the PDF file to your free Kindle account, put CONVERT in the subject line, and Amazon will convert it to AZW format for you which will make it just like a regular Kindle book
Yeah, or just use the "EZ PDF Reader" app on your tablet and .pdf files work very nicely.
